structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

text.section: Act entirely in an advisory capacity, except as provided in section two hundred and seventy-one. A majority of the members of the board present and voting shall constitute the basis for an official action or recommendation of said board.
Consider all matters submitted to it by the director.
On its own initiative recommend to the department such rules and regulations and any changes thereon which the advisory board may deem important and necessary.
Co-operate in the preparation of rules and regulations supplemental to the provisions of this law.
